report:
**Damage Report:**

**Vehicle Make/Model:** [Insert Vehicle Make/Model]
**VIN:** [Insert VIN Number]
**Date of Inspection:** [Insert Date]

**Location of Damage:**
The rear bumper of the vehicle shows significant damage. There is a noticeable dent or indentation on the right side of the bumper, extending from the lower edge towards the center.

**Type of Damage:**
The damage appears to be a dent or impact mark, likely caused by a collision or a heavy object hitting the rear of the vehicle. The dent is localized but affects the structural integrity of the bumper.

**Additional Observations:**
- The paint on the affected area seems intact, suggesting that the dent may not have caused any significant damage to the underlying structure.
- No other visible damage is noted on the rear bumper or surrounding areas.

**Recommendation:**
Based on the observed damage, it is recommended that the vehicle undergoes a professional inspection to assess the extent of the damage and determine if repairs are necessary. If the dent is deep enough, it may require bodywork to restore the bumper to its original shape and function.

**Prepared By:**
[Your Name]  
Insurance Adjuster  
[Your Company]  
[Contact Information]  

**Note:** This report is based on the visual inspection provided. Further assessment by a qualified mechanic or repair professional is advised before finalizing any repairs.
